casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Jerry Giovani THOMPSON 24A18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 5, 2018 Erik R. Zimmerman, Attorney at Law, Chapel Hill, for Thompson, Jerry. Robert T. Broughton, Assistant Attorney General, R. Andrew Murray, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 2nd of March 2018 by State of NC:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 5th of March 2018."

State of NC shall have up to and including the 9th day of April 2018 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
